El Trull

Restaurant El Trull is specialized in seasonal Mediterranean cuisine with special attention to the selection of products, always based in the quality, and in continuous evolution since 1968. This restaurant is located near Lloret de Mar, just 20 minutes away by coach from Camiral hotel.

El Trull dining room has a private and warm atmosphere, perfect to enjoy their menus or the seasonal special menus. If you prefer it, they also offer halls and private rooms for meetings and private celebrations. More than 40 gastronomy and hotel management professionals work in the kitchen and in the dining room. All the staff will be in charge of making your experience in the restaurant as you like.

Their cuisine is mainly supplied by the Girona coast fishing, especially the fish market of Llançà, Port de la Selva, Palamós and Blanes. They have fish and shellfish hatcheries which guarantee an exceptional culinary quality all year long.

Location: Lloret de Mar

Dining room capacities: Suitable for 200 people

Price Level: average-high

Style: Seasonal Mediterranean cuisine

Vegetarian Options/Special diets: Available

Handicapped facilities: Yes
